target: TEXT_STMBDA320_02496_SEQ_00<tab>Yugiri est décidée à libérer les villageois par la force.
TEXT_STMBDA320_02496_TODO_00<tab>Observer les environs à l'endroit indiqué

source: TEXT_STMBDA320_02496_TODO_02<tab>Steal a suitable uniform from a sleeping soldier.
TEXT_STMBDA320_02496_TODO_04<tab>While in uniform, perform an /imperialsalute to the guards.
TEXT_STMBDA320_02496_YUGIRI_000_000<tab>Despite the urgency of the situation, we must still proceed with the utmost caution to ensure the safety of the villagers.
target: TEXT_STMBDA320_02496_YUGIRI_000_000<tab>Malgré l'urgence de la situation, tâchons d'avancer avec la plus grande prudence pour ne pas risquer la sécurité des villageois.

source: TEXT_STMBDA320_02496_YUGIRI_000_001<tab>To wit, we must infiltrate the castrum without raising the alarum.
target: TEXT_STMBDA320_02496_YUGIRI_000_001<tab>Cela veut dire que nous devons nous infiltrer à l'intérieur du castrum sans nous faire remarquer.

source: TEXT_STMBDA320_02496_YUGIRI_000_002<tab>I will deal with any soldiers near the entrance. Stand watch for others approaching from the north until you hear my signal.
target: TEXT_STMBDA320_02496_YUGIRI_000_002<tab>Je vais m'occuper des soldats près de l'entrée. Observez les environs pour repérer si une éventuelle relève arrive par le nord.

source: TEXT_STMBDA320_02496_SYSTEM_000_010<tab>For a mercy, you spy no imperial patrols bound for the castrum. A hawk's cry pierces the silence─Yugiri is waiting.
target: TEXT_STMBDA320_02496_SYSTEM_000_010<tab>Il n'y a pas l'ombre d'un soldat impérial à l'horizon. Vous pouvez rejoindre Yugiri sans crainte.

source: TEXT_STMBDA320_02496_BIGSOLDIER02496_000_020<tab>Mmm... Mmm... No, you sign off first... <snore>
TEXT_STMBDA320_02496_YUGIRI_000_040<tab>Speak softly, lest the others hear us. What of the outside?
target:
TEXT_STMBDA320_02496_YUGIRI_000_040<tab>Je n'ai jamais entendu ronfler aussi fort<var 1D /var>!<var 1D /var>...
Rien à signaler de votre côté<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_STMBDA320_02496_YUGIRI_000_041<tab>...That is good. We may proceed as planned.
target: TEXT_STMBDA320_02496_YUGIRI_000_041<tab>Tant mieux. Dans ce cas, nous allons pouvoir continuer.

source: TEXT_STMBDA320_02496_YUGIRI_000_042<tab>These ones shall not soon wake. However, the others are too close to the villagers. Incapacitating them as I did these ones is far too risky.
target: TEXT_STMBDA320_02496_YUGIRI_000_042<tab>Faites-moi confiance, ceux-là ne se réveilleront pas de sitôt. Par contre, il va nous falloir trouver un autre moyen pour les gardes qui sont plus près des villageois...

source: TEXT_STMBDA320_02496_YUGIRI_000_043<tab>Fortunately, a solution presents itself. I would have you disguise yourself as an imperial soldier and convince them that a changing of the guard is in order.
target: TEXT_STMBDA320_02496_YUGIRI_000_043<tab>J'ai une idée. Que diriez-vous de vous déguiser en soldat impérial<var 1D /var>? De cette façon, vous pourriez convaincre ceux qui nous gênent que la relève est arrivée.

source: TEXT_STMBDA320_02496_YUGIRI_000_044<tab>You have your pick of uniforms. They shall not protest.
target: TEXT_STMBDA320_02496_YUGIRI_000_044<tab>Regardez, vous n'avez qu'à vous baisser pour choisir votre uniforme.

source: TEXT_STMBDA320_02496_YUGIRI_000_050<tab>I would not presume to choose for you. You know your own proportions best.
target: TEXT_STMBDA320_02496_YUGIRI_000_050<tab>Ils étaient tous les trois en repos et ne portaient donc pas de casque ou de gants, mais peu importe. Je vous fais confiance pour choisir l'uniforme qui correspond le mieux à votre silhouette.

source: TEXT_STMBDA320_02496_SYSTEM_000_060<tab>This uniform appears to be more or less your size...
target: TEXT_STMBDA320_02496_SYSTEM_000_060<tab>Cet uniforme vous ira comme un gant.

source: TEXT_STMBDA320_02496_SYSTEM_000_061<tab>Although this unform is quite large in several places, with a few minor adjustments, it appears as though it could suffice...
target: TEXT_STMBDA320_02496_SYSTEM_000_061<tab>Cet uniforme semble trop grand, mais il devrait vous aller après quelques ajustements.

source: TEXT_STMBDA320_02496_SYSTEM_000_062<tab>Although this uniform is a little large for your tastes, with a few minor adjustments, it appears as though it could suffice...
target: TEXT_STMBDA320_02496_SYSTEM_000_062<tab>Cet uniforme semble trop grand, mais il devrait vous aller après quelques ajustements.

source: TEXT_STMBDA320_02496_SYSTEM_000_063<tab>If there were three of you standing on each other's shoulders, you could perhaps fit into this uniform. Walking, however, would present a challenge.
target: TEXT_STMBDA320_02496_SYSTEM_000_063<tab>Cet uniforme est si grand qu'une seule jambe de pantalon suffirait à vous habiller...

source: TEXT_STMBDA320_02496_SYSTEM_000_064<tab>This uniform is far too large for you to wear comfortably.
target: TEXT_STMBDA320_02496_SYSTEM_000_064<tab>Cet uniforme est bien trop grand pour vous...

source: TEXT_STMBDA320_02496_SYSTEM_000_065<tab>This uniform appears to be more or less your size...
target: TEXT_STMBDA320_02496_SYSTEM_000_065<tab>Cet uniforme vous ira comme un gant.

source: TEXT_STMBDA320_02496_SYSTEM_000_066<tab>...It would probably be considered obscene to wear this uniform in polite company.
target: TEXT_STMBDA320_02496_SYSTEM_000_066<tab>Cet uniforme vous serait cer<var 16 /var>tai<var 16 /var>ne<var 16 /var>ment allé... si vous étiez toujours enfant.

source: TEXT_STMBDA320_02496_SYSTEM_000_067<tab>Attempting to wear this uniform might force you to confront certain uncomfortable realities better left unexplored...
target: TEXT_STMBDA320_02496_SYSTEM_000_067<tab>Cet uniforme est beaucoup trop petit pour vous...

source: TEXT_STMBDA320_02496_SYSTEM_000_068<tab>Perhaps, in another life, this uniform would have suited you perfectly. But not this one.
target: TEXT_STMBDA320_02496_SYSTEM_000_068<tab>Cet uniforme est beaucoup trop petit pour vous...

source: TEXT_STMBDA320_02496_SYSTEM_000_069<tab>...Upon further consideration, you realize that such ambition would better serve you on the battlefield.
target: TEXT_STMBDA320_02496_SYSTEM_000_069<tab>Cet uniforme serait parfait... pour aller vous baigner à Costa del Sol.

source: TEXT_STMBDA320_02496_SYSTEM_000_070<tab>...Though it is often said that one should aspire to bigger and better things, it would not be prudent at this juncture.
target: TEXT_STMBDA320_02496_SYSTEM_000_070<tab>Cet uniforme est bien trop grand pour vous...

source: TEXT_STMBDA320_02496_SYSTEM_000_071<tab>Although this uniform is a little small for your tastes, with a few minor adjustments, it appears as though it could suffice...
target: TEXT_STMBDA320_02496_SYSTEM_000_071<tab>Cet uniforme semble un peu court, mais il devrait faire l'affaire.

source: TEXT_STMBDA320_02496_SYSTEM_000_072<tab>This uniform appears to be more or less your size...
target: TEXT_STMBDA320_02496_SYSTEM_000_072<tab>Cet uniforme semble plus ou moins à votre taille.

source: TEXT_STMBDA320_02496_SYSTEM_000_073<tab>With all due care and consideration, you relieve the sleeping soldier of their uniform.
target: TEXT_STMBDA320_02496_SYSTEM_000_073<tab>Vous déshabillez délicatement le soldat endormi pour vous emparer de <var 33 ((Item)) 06F250750202 /var>, de <var 33 ((Item)) 06F250770202 /var> et de <var 33 ((Item)) 06F250780202 /var>.

source: TEXT_STMBDA320_02496_YUGIRI_000_074<tab>You have chosen one to your liking, then? Excellent.
target: TEXT_STMBDA320_02496_YUGIRI_000_074<tab>Vous avez trouvé un uniforme à votre taille<var 1D /var>? Parfait.

source: TEXT_STMBDA320_02496_YUGIRI_000_075<tab>I shall hide these ones where none will find them.
target: TEXT_STMBDA320_02496_YUGIRI_000_075<tab>Je vais cacher ceux-là pour que personne ne les remarque. Attendez un instant.

source: TEXT_STMBDA320_02496_YUGIRI_000_076<tab>Our sleeping beauties have been laid to rest in their bunks. Oh, and while I was in the barracks, I happened upon these spare uniforms, in case the items in your possession are not to your liking.
target: TEXT_STMBDA320_02496_YUGIRI_000_076<tab>Voilà... Je les ai mis dans des lits de la caserne. Personne ne devrait se rendre compte du subterfuge ainsi. J'en ai profité pour rapporter des pièces d'équipement.

source: TEXT_STMBDA320_02496_SYSTEM_000_080<tab>The sack appears to be filled with a nigh-infinite supply of imperial equipment...though it would be best if you did not attempt to put that cursory assessment to the proof.
target: TEXT_STMBDA320_02496_SYSTEM_000_080<tab>Ce sac contient des pièces d'équipement de rechange rapportées par Yugiri.

source: TEXT_STMBDA320_02496_SYSTEM_000_081<tab>The sack appears to be filled with a nigh-infinite supply of imperial equipment...though it would be best if you did not attempt to put that cursory assessment to the proof.
target: TEXT_STMBDA320_02496_SYSTEM_000_081<tab>Ce sac contient des pièces d'équipement de rechange rapportées par Yugiri.

source: TEXT_STMBDA320_02496_YUGIRI_000_090<tab>This kabuto and tekko should match the uwagi, hakama, and choka in your possession...
target: TEXT_STMBDA320_02496_YUGIRI_000_090<tab>J'ai choisi <var 33 ((Item)) 02F250740202 /var> et <var 33 ((Item)) 02F250760202 /var> en me basant sur votre gabarit.

source: TEXT_STMBDA320_02496_YUGIRI_000_091<tab>And with that, you have a full set. I am sure that once you change, it will seem as though it was bespoke.
target: TEXT_STMBDA320_02496_YUGIRI_000_091<tab>Avec ça, vous devriez avoir tout ce qu'il faut pour jouer le rôle du parfait petit soldat.

source: TEXT_STMBDA320_02496_YUGIRI_000_092<tab>You will need to give the soldiers guarding the villagers a proper <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>imperial salute<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> to complete the deception and convince them to come here, where I will be waiting to deal with them.
target: TEXT_STMBDA320_02496_YUGIRI_000_092<tab>Enfilez l'uniforme au complet et allez faire le <var 1A 02 /var>salut impérial<var 1A 01 /var> aux deux sentinelles qui sont sur la place. N'oubliez pas de leur préciser que la relève est arrivée. Lorsqu'ils partiront, je me chargerai de les endormir.

source: TEXT_STMBDA320_02496_YUGIRI_000_100<tab>The imperial soldiers assigned to Doma are hardly the Empire's best and brightest. Nevertheless, you will need to approach them in uniform if you wish to convince them you are one of their own.

TEXT_STMBDA320_02496_YUGIRI_000_101<tab>Do not forget to give them an <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>imperial salute<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>. They may not be the most clever soldiers in the imperial army, but they know protocol.
target: TEXT_STMBDA320_02496_YUGIRI_000_101<tab>Une fois devant les sentinelles sur la place, effectuez le <var 1A 02 /var>salut impérial<var 1A 01 /var> et faites-leur savoir que la relève est arrivée.

source: TEXT_STMBDA320_02496_YUGIRI_000_102<tab>...In the strange and inexplicable event that you somehow dispose of all or part of your uniform, you may search these sacks for replacements. Not that there should be any need for that. Certainly not.
target: TEXT_STMBDA320_02496_YUGIRI_000_102<tab>Si jamais vous perdez une pièce de l'uniforme, revenez ici. Vous en trouverez une de rechange dans l'un des sacs que j'ai posés à côté.

source: TEXT_STMBDA320_02496_SYSTEM_000_105<tab>The sack appears to be filled with a nigh-infinite supply of kabuto and tekko...

TEXT_STMBDA320_02496_SYSTEM_000_106<tab>Being the prudent and responsible individual that you are, you resolve only to take items to replace those which you may have misplaced under circumstances better left unsaid.
target: TEXT_STMBDA320_02496_SYSTEM_000_106<tab>Vous avez récupéré ce qu'il vous manquait de l'uniforme de soldat impérial<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_STMBDA320_02496_SYSTEM_000_107<tab>The sack appears to be filled with a nigh-infinite supply of uwagi, hakama, and choka...
TEXT_STMBDA320_02496_SOLDIERC02495_000_110<tab>Huh!? How did you get in here! Leave, now!
target: TEXT_STMBDA320_02496_SOLDIERC02495_000_110<tab>Hein, qu'est-ce que tu fais là<var 1D /var>? Dégage avant qu'on te tabasse<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_STMBDA320_02496_SOLDIERC02495_000_112<tab>...I don't know what you're about, but don't think that the provinces are any less strict than the capital. The viceroy does not tolerate insubordination.
target: TEXT_STMBDA320_02496_SOLDIERC02495_000_112<tab>T'as déjà oublié ta formation<var 1D /var>? C'est pas parce qu'on est loin de la capitale qu'il faut se relâcher sur la discipline<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_STMBDA320_02496_SOLDIERC02495_000_113<tab>Is it time already? Not that I'm complaining, mind, but I thought the others would be gone longer...
target: TEXT_STMBDA320_02496_SOLDIERC02495_000_113<tab>C'est déjà l'heure de la relève<var 1D /var>? Bizarre, je viens juste de prendre ma garde... Enfin bon, je vais pas me plaindre.

source: TEXT_STMBDA320_02496_SOLDIERD02496_000_114<tab>Hah hah, very amusing, you. Is this a drill? Am I supposed to bellow, “Rebel insurgents! To arms, to arms!” or some such rot?
target: TEXT_STMBDA320_02496_SOLDIERD02496_000_114<tab>Ha ha, très amusant. Si tu veux t'amuser, va plutôt le faire loin de cette base. Pigé<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_STMBDA320_02496_SOLDIERD02496_000_115<tab>Let me guess: hangover, eh? I've been there─woke up once after a late night drinking and didn't find my kabuto until days later. You don't want to know what it was filled with, let me tell you...
target: TEXT_STMBDA320_02496_SOLDIERD02496_000_115<tab>Je peux savoir ce que tu viens faire ici<var 1D /var>? Tu te balades, c'est ça<var 1D /var>? Retourne à ton poste illico presto<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_STMBDA320_02496_SOLDIERD02496_000_116<tab>...This is that game where you try to make me guess a word or phrase by gesticulating wildly, isn't it? Hmm...can you do it again?

TEXT_STMBDA320_02496_SOLDIERD02496_000_117<tab>Changing of the guard, is it? About bloody time. Just looking at these Aan is making me depressed. Reminds me of when I was in their shoes, pissing myself in fear...
target: TEXT_STMBDA320_02496_SOLDIERD02496_000_117<tab>Enfin, la relève<var 1D /var>! C'est que je commençais à en avoir ma claque de voir la mine déconfite de tous ces villageois... Bon courage, tu vas en avoir besoin.

source: TEXT_STMBDA320_02496_YUGIRI_000_130<tab>These ones shall sleep soundly along with the others...
target: TEXT_STMBDA320_02496_YUGIRI_000_130<tab>Bien joué, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Ceux-là vont bientôt rejoindre leurs camarades qui font la sieste depuis tout à l'heure.

source: TEXT_STMBDA320_02496_YUGIRI_000_131<tab>And, with that, there are no more soldiers to trouble us. You can dispose of that accursed uniform too.
target: TEXT_STMBDA320_02496_YUGIRI_000_131<tab>Et voilà, plus de gardes pour nous ennuyer, maintenant. Je pense que vous pouvez retirer cet accoutrement.

source: TEXT_STMBDA320_02496_YUGIRI_000_132<tab>It is time to guide the villagers to freedom!
target: TEXT_STMBDA320_02496_YUGIRI_000_132<tab>La voie est libre, allons vite libérer les villageois<var 1D /var>! J'en ai aperçu un sur la butte au sud<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_STMBDA320_02496_YUGIRI_000_140<tab>Quickly, we must go to the villagers before more soldiers come!
target: TEXT_STMBDA320_02496_YUGIRI_000_140<tab>Vite, nous devons aller libérer les villageois avant que la vraie relève n'arrive<var 1D /var>! J'en ai aperçu un sur la butte au sud<var 1D /var>!
